concept.title: What's changed in version 1.1
concept.shortdesc: Understand the changes that are delivered as part of version 1.1

dlentry.dd: Scripts that are created for use with version 1.1 cannot be used on earlier versions of if the script uses function added in version 1.1. For more information about the function added in version 1.1, see .
Because of changes to the format of the store, you cannot roll back from version 1.1 to earlier firmware versions.
You can edit the Max Messages and Retained Messages fields of a destination mapping rule while the rule is enabled. For all other fields, you must disable the rule before you edit the rule.

dlentry.dt: Ordering connection policies and messaging policies on an endpoint
dlentry.dd: The order of connection policies and messaging policies shown in the endpoint definition matches the order in which the policies are applied. You can change the order by editing the endpoint. In the , select the policy that you want to move, and use the arrow icons to move it in the list. On the command line, use the imaserver update endpoint command to specify the policies in the order that they are to be applied.
